wiki.content: The Both of Us Songfacts says that it was Taylor who came up with the idea for the collaboration after she visited B.o.B's Grand Hustle record label HQ. The rapper explained that, "she came to Atlanta and she hit up Grand Hustle. I wasn't there. Tip was there and I eventually linked with her in Dallas and the rest is history." User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The Both of Us Songfacts says that it was Taylor who came up with the idea for the collaboration after she visited B.o.B's Grand Hustle record label HQ. The rapper explained that, "she came to Atlanta and she hit up Grand Hustle. I wasn't there. Tip was there and I eventually linked with her in Dallas and the rest is history."
